title: Custom Skins
body: So I was just curious how do custom skins work? I'm really confused how you get them where you get them and how to use them? Please help me out!

replies.body:
Hello!!

Secondly you watch this video about Super Installer Ultimate(SIU) LoL skin dowloader

Thank you for the help!!! Much Appreciated, I will try it out and ask for help if it doesn't work! Thank you very much!

Just an FYI, using third party software is a "do at your own risk" kind of thing, even if it doesn't give you any kind of unfair advantage. Sometimes, Riot can't differentiate between aesthetic software (such as what you are seeking) and software that gives an unfair advantage, so if you use such software just be aware that you may end up with punishments regarding third party software.

Just a note
Program that DOESN'T affect other people and players experience won't be banned
Like skins !
But skillshot dodger is not ok

> Program that DOESN'T affect other people and players experience won't be banned

There's no guarantee of that. Riot has stated before that third party software is "use at your own risk" *because* they can't always differentiate between what is aesthetic (like customs skins) and what gives an unfair advantage.
But for right now,custom skins is ok
